attributes.action: allow us to vote against as well as in support of petitions on this site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is quite amusing that there is a petition for Jeremy Clarkson to be PM.  BUT There are some more unpleasant petitions that we would like to express our dissatisfaction with by voting against. Allowing people to vote against petitions as well as in favour may help the PM better understand the divide in peoples views and so aid a better understanding views of the electorate as a whole.

rejection.details: Please send comments and suggestions on the e-petitions system to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
